name: Air Piano (Onionman77)
description:
This is just a test of a _hopefully_ upcoming VR app to run on the Quest. You will need an Oculus Quest to run it, and it will need to be sideloaded with SideQuest

This is just a test of the Quest finger tracking really. I had the idea to make a VR piano that could be played on the go. Unfortunately it seems like finger tracking isn't quite there yet, but I'm hoping that it will get there in time! For now I'm just putting it up as some have asked to try it out even as is right now.
